      • resumeAuthentication

        @Nonnull
protected SignServiceProcessingResult resumeAuthentication​(@Nonnull
                                                           HttpUserRequest httpRequest,
                                                           @Nonnull
                                                           EngineContext context)
                                                    throws UnrecoverableSignServiceException
        Is called when the engine is invoked after the user has been directed to the authentication service. When the authentication is resumed it means that the issued authentication credentials (assertion) is being processed by the authentication handler. If everything is ok, the control is the passed back to the "finalize" phase.
        Parameters:
        httpRequest - the HTTP request
        context - the engine context
        Returns:
        a SignServiceProcessingResult object
        Throws:
        UnrecoverableSignServiceException - for unrecoverable errors

      • completeAuthentication

        protected void completeAuthentication​(@Nonnull
                                      HttpUserRequest httpRequest,
                                      @Nonnull
                                      AuthenticationResult authnResult,
                                      @Nonnull
                                      EngineContext context)
                               throws UnrecoverableSignServiceException,
                                      SignServiceErrorException
        The "complete authentication" method is invoked after the authentication handler has reported a successful user authentication. At this point we know that the handler has asserted that the required user attributes were presented during the authentication, but we still need to check some additional things. This includes asserting that the signature message was displayed (if required) and making sure that we received attributes from the authentication needed to create the certificate contents.
        Parameters:
        httpRequest - the HTTP request
        authnResult - the authentication result
        context - the engine context
        Throws:
        UnrecoverableSignServiceException - for unrecoverable errors
        SignServiceErrorException - for errors that should be passed back to the client (as an error response)

      • createErrorResponse

        @Nonnull
protected SignServiceProcessingResult createErrorResponse​(@Nonnull
                                                          HttpUserRequest httpRequest,
                                                          @Nonnull
                                                          EngineContext context,
                                                          @Nonnull
                                                          SignServiceError error)
                                                   throws UnrecoverableSignServiceException
        Method that is invoked to create an error response message that is to be sent back to the client.
        Parameters:
        httpRequest - the HTTP request
        context - the engine context
        error - the representation of the error to send
        Returns:
        a SignServiceProcessingResult
        Throws:
        UnrecoverableSignServiceException - for unrecoverable errors

      • isSignRequestEndpoint

        protected boolean isSignRequestEndpoint​(@Nonnull
                                        HttpUserRequest httpRequest)
        Predicate that tells if the supplied HTTP request is sent to an endpoint where the engine expects to receive SignRequest messages on.
        Parameters:
        httpRequest - the HTTP request
        Returns:
        true if the request is sent to a SignRequest endpoint and false otherwise

      • setupContext

        @Nonnull
protected EngineContext setupContext​(@Nullable
                                     SignServiceContext signServiceContext)
        Given a SignServiceContext the method sets up an EngineContext.

        If the supplied context is terminated, a new SignServiceContext object is created. This helps applications that does not manage sessions correctly to function anyway.

        Parameters:
        signServiceContext - the SignService context, or null
        Returns:
        an engine context

      • setSignRequestMessageVerifier

        Assigns the SignRequestMessageVerifier to use when verifying a SignRequestMessage.
        Parameters:
        signRequestMessageVerifier - verifier instance
